sentence.Network_en: An artist sculpted a full-size replica of her head.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位艺术家按实际大小雕刻了一个她的头部模型。

sentence.Network_en: Tina as a child was a replica of her mother.
sentence.Network_cn: 蒂娜小的时候和她妈妈简直一模一样。

sentence.Network_en: Replica weapons are indistinguishable from the real thing.
sentence.Network_cn: 仿真武器与真武器很难区分。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 系统能同步的运行以便复制品（replicas）能保证是最新的，对应于所有已提交的事务。但是这样做可能回招致性能上的很大的下降。

两个复本（replica）之间的更改枚举destination provider 向 source provider 请求更改的过程如下：destination replica 确保那些与 so.
replenish 再加满，补充replica 复制品，复制-

list.abs: replica 复制replica method 复型法reprecipitation 二次沉下
副本集(Replica Set)就是有自动故障恢复功能的主从集群.主从集群和副本集最明显的区别是副本集没有固定的"主节点",整个集群会选 …
surface mounted (pressure) gauge,凸装压力表surface replica,表面复型surface tension balance,表面张力天平
...收藏查看复制光栅replica grating用原刻制成的用来代替昂贵的原刻光栅.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (as a musical term in the sense 'a repeat'): from Italian, from replicare 'to reply'

entry.def: A replica of something such as a statue, building, or weapon is an accurate copy of it.

example.ex: ...a human-sized replica of the Statue of Liberty...
example.tran: 真人大小的自由女神像复制品

example.ex: Royce Hall was an exact replica of the basilica of Sant Ambrogio in Milan...
example.tran: 罗伊斯大厅是位于米兰的圣安布洛乔大教堂的原样复制建筑。

entry.def: If you say that one person is a replica of another, you mean that the first person looks very like the second.

example.ex: Tina as a child was a replica of her mother.
example.tran: 蒂娜小的时候和她妈妈简直一模一样。

means.word_mean: 1. copy that is not the original; something that has been copied

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fold,表示"重叠,重复"; 2. 折; 3. 弯

stems_affixes.word_buile: complicate使..复杂+ed……的→adj.复杂的, 难解的
ex出+plic重叠,重复+able可以……的→能把重叠的东西弄出来→可解释的→explicate形容词
im进入+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→含蓄的
ac加强+com+plic重叠,重复+e→共同重叠在一起做事→同谋
complicate弄复杂+ion表名词→complication复杂,纠纷
com共同+plic重叠,重复+ity表名词→共同重叠→同谋的关系
re再+plic重叠,重复+a表名词→再重叠[一分]的[东西]→复制品
com全部+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→全部重叠起来→弄复杂
ex出+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→把重叠的东西弄出来→解释
ex出,往外+ploit=plic重叠+it→把折叠之物展开→使用

stems_affixes.value_cn: 牵连[于罪行中],含蓄表达
stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→[说话]进入重叠,不直说→含蓄表达
re再+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→再重叠[一分]→复制

sentences.en: His hobby is building replicas of cars.
sentences.cn: 他的爱好是制作汽车的复制品。

sentences.en: She made a 1:5 scale replica of Captain Cook’s ship, ‘The Endeavour’.
sentences.cn: 她制作了一个比例为1:5 的库克船长的“奋进”号的复制品。
